metadata.synopsis: The doctor urges the player to come and interact with the device.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Plays when the doctor goes to the device, triggered in the Doctor dialog.

0.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
0.text: Even githyanki rarely experience the zaith'isk. You are very lucky, istik.

1.speaker: Ghustil Stornugoss
1.text: Most of our kin never get to experience the zaith'isk. Vlaakith smiles on you.
